articles.author: Danya Bazaraa
articles.title: Coronavirus: England has reached 'tipping point' warns deputy chief medical officer - Mirror Online
articles.description: Deputy Chief Medical Officer Professor Jonathan Van-Tam pleaded to the public that we must act now to prevent history repeating itself as he quoted rising infection figures
articles.content:
The UK has reached a tipping point in the fight against coronavirus - similar to the stage we were at in March, the Deputy Chief Medical Officer has said. 
Professor Jonathan Van-Tam pleaded to the … [+1735 chars]
